item.title: Analytics
item.description: AnalyticsYou can use custom hostname analytics for two general purposes: exploring how your customers use your product and sharing the benefits provided by Cloudflare with your customers. These analytics include Site Analytics, Bot Analytics, Cache Analytics, Security Events, and any other datasets with the clientRequestHTTPHost field.
